author: Staff
title: The Demi Ramos Show: KiNG MALA
description: Over the last three years, KiNG MALA has established herself as of pop music's brightest talents. With soulful vocals and impeccable production, the singer-songwriter easily shifts from playful to badass.Her latest, "sunny side up," is a darkly funny breakup song about a past relationship. "My previous partner and I fought over everything towards the end of our relationship," she recalls. "Every other morning was an episode of burnt toast, or ‘too-sweet’ coffee, or ‘we’re out of eggs.’ Nothing was right and the resentment had built to such a level that our morning fights had become...

author: Andrea Sachs
title: The germiest spots in your hotel room, according to an inspector
description: Don’t use the hotel’s coffee pot, advises this inspector with more than 30 years of assessing hotel rooms in the US.

author: Andrea Sachs
title: The germiest spots in your hotel room, according to an inspector
description: Don’t use the hotel’s coffee pot, advises this inspector with more than 30 years of assessing hotel rooms in the US.

author: José Rodríguez Jr.
title: This Massive Chinese Car Show Was Pure Chaos
description: Imagine the chaos of your local cars and coffee — full of modified BMWs, Challengers and Mustangs — but an order of magnitude greater. Now, put that in one of China’s wealthiest cities, with thousands of tuned cars, and that’s the GT Show. It certainly didn’t fail to deliver on the expectation of radical sports cars…Read more...

author: Claire Cartmill
title: Northern Irish former footballer opens new clothing store in Portrush thanks to over £250,000 investment and creating 12 local jobs
description: The first ever store from North Coast NI will be located on Eglinton Street and offer an extensive collection of outdoor coastal wear as well as sit-in coffee offering

author: Bagavathi Eswaran
title: Millionaire Shaquille O’Neal, Who Claimed Black People Don’t Drink Coffee, Schools Masterchef Legend: “Regular Hard-Working People, We Don’t Have Time for That”
description: Shaquille O’Neal is arguably the most multi-talented former athlete ever. Big Diesel can do it all. From breaking backboards to making rap songs and a whole host of other things. The 4x NBA champion has had no problem challenging some of the biggest stars from other disciplines. Notably, Shaq was once part of a TV…The post Millionaire Shaquille O’Neal, Who Claimed Black People Don’t Drink Coffee, Schools Masterchef Legend: “Regular Hard-Working People, We Don’t Have Time for That” appeared first on EssentiallySports.

author: BusinessWorld
title: [B-SIDE Podcast] Advancing the Philippine coffee industry
description: The local demand for coffee outpaces its production in the Philippines, according to an industry expert.

author: Alexandra Gerea
title: Is oat milk good for you? Here’s what the science says
description: Oat milk has become one of people's favorite alternatives to dairy. Its taste and texture make it an excellent replacement, particularly in tea, coffee, or cereal. But is oat milk good for you? The short answer is 'yes'. Oat has a lot of health benefits like fibers, vitamins, and antioxidants. It also doesn't have some […]

author: Jeremy Veno
title: Parked car vandalised, set on fire by a group of men in Kuching
description: KUCHING (July 23): A car that was parked in front of a coffee shop at Mile 9 here was vandalised and set on fire by a group of men around 12.10am this morning. The incident was recorded and also shared by netizens on social media, who speculated that the suspects might be the same gang [...]

author: Abbey Maclure
title: Fika North Leeds: Headingley coffee shop set to reopen following refurbishment with exciting additions
description: A popular Leeds coffee shop is set to reopen following a refurbishment, with a new dedicated takeaway hatch.

author: Daniel Walton
title: 'Are you really deaf?' Customer 'left in tears' following Costa experience
description: A coffee lover says she was left in tears after being asked if she was "really deaf" at a Costa Coffee store.

author: Brooke Kato
title: Lana Del Rey seen picking up shift at Waffle House as fans gush: ‘So real’
description: The "Young and Beautiful" crooner wore the chain's signature blue uniform complete with a bright yellow name tag as she took orders and poured patrons' coffee.

author: Megan K. Stack
title: Inside Starbucks’ Dirty War Against Organized Labor
description: As strikes explode across America, the coffee chain’s story holds a lesson on how to fight — and how the bosses fight dirty.

author: Jason Brow
title: Carli Lloyd Says To Keep An Eye On These U.S. Women’s Soccer Stars During The 2023 World Cup (Exclusive)
description: With the Women's World Cup kicking off, Carli Lloyd teams with FanDuel for the 'FanFuel' coffee to help you catch every second. She also shares who on Team USA you should watch.

author: Maia Luem
title: LoHi’s Method Coffee opens second location along Santa Fe Drive
description: Method Coffee Roasters, which has operated in LoHi since 2018, opened its second location this week at 1201 Santa Fe Drive in Lincoln Park. The 1,200-square-foot space was previously home to The Molecule Effect, which also sold coffee.
